name: @atlas/database
description: Drizzle schema and migrations for primary PostgreSQL database.

scripts.db:generateMigrationsAndVerifyNoChanges: drizzle-kit generate | tee /dev/tty | (grep 'No schema changes, nothing to migrate' > /dev/null) || (echo '\033[0;91mERROR: your migrations were out of date. Migrations have been generated for you, `git add` them and try again.' 1>&2 ; sh -c 'false')
